text: Sherry Lynn is an American voice actress who has played roles in anime, animated television series and video games. She portrayed Sasami Jurai in the Tenchi Muyo! franchise. ==Filmography== ===Animation=== * The Dukes (1983, TV Series) - (voice) * The Get-Along Gang (1983) - Portia Porcupine (voice) * Pink Panther and Sons (1984, TV Series) – Chatta (voice) * My Little Pony (1986, TV Series) -
